properties.MUN_NAME: Multi-Municipal - Beverly City, Burlington City, Burlington Township, Cinnaminson Township, Delanco Township, Delran Township, Edgewater Park Township, Florence Township, Palmyra Borough, Riverside Township, Riverton Borough, Willingboro Township
properties.PROJ_DESC: The River Route Circulation Plan will focus on updating the 1997 circulation and transportation component of the River Route Master Plan. The plan will identify safety, functional, and operational problems and provide investment strategies to link
properties.PROJ_DESC2: transportation improvements with economic development opportunities.
properties.TITLE: River Route Circulation Plan

properties.MUN_NAME: Multi-Municipal - Beverly City, Delanco Township & Edgewater Park Township
properties.PROJECTNAM: Conceptual Design Plan to Route 130 Intersections
properties.PROJ_DESC: An in-depth land use and buildout analysis will be conducted for the communities of Beverly, Delanco, and Edgewater Park to assess the future traffic volumes for the interchange at location 32 along U.S. Route 130.
properties.TITLE: Conceptual Design Plan to Route 130 Intersections

properties.PROJ_DESC: The Township will develop a vision for the area adjacent to the PATCO Woodcrest Station that supports transit-oriented development and
properties.TITLE: Woodcrest Station Transit-Oriented Development (TOD) Plan

properties.PROJECTNAM: Walter Rand Market Feasibility & Station Redesign
properties.PROJ_DESC: A new interior and exterior redesign/concept plan will be developed for the Walter Rand Transportation Center in order to better leverage existing transportation infrastructure as a resource to transform
properties.PROJ_DESC2: a derelict facility into a world class transportation center.
properties.TITLE: Walter Rand Market Feasibility & Station Redesign

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will develop a balance between travel modes, parking needs, and the future economic development in Princeton’s downtown.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: A parking demand baseline will be developed with short and long-term recommendations to accommodate future downtown residential development parking needs.
properties.TITLE: Princeton Parking: Inventory, Analysis & Recommendations

properties.PROJ_DESC: The Downtown Trenton Waterfront Reclamation Redevelopment Project (Route 29 realignment) is a shared vision to reconnect the City to the waterfront.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: TCDI funding will be used to identify case studies, review FEMA regulations, and develop a regional market analysis, and promotional materials.
properties.TITLE: Waterfront Reclamation and Redevelopment Project

properties.PROJ_DESC: In an effort to address the investment in the I-95–PA turnpike connection and Route 13, an economic development study will be performed to assess the impact of the transportation improvements on economic conditions and adjoining land uses and zoning.
properties.TITLE: Economic Development Analysis

properties.PROJ_DESC: Design concepts will be developed to promote Chester County as a tourist destination and provide for the ease and safety of visitors traveling unfamiliar winding roads through the Brandywine region.
properties.TITLE: Brandywine Valley Wayfinding Signage Plan

properties.MUN_NAME: Multi-Municipal - Phoenixville Borough, Schuylkill Township, East Pikeland Township, Charlestown Township, West Vincent Township & Upper Providence Township
properties.PROJ_DESC: This multi-municipal study will include Phoenixville Borough, Schuylkill Township, East Pikeland Township, Charlestown Township, West Vincent Township, and Upper Providence Township.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: Chester County staff will develop a multi-modal plan in response to the new residential development and increase in single occupancy vehicles on the road network in the Phoenixville region.
properties.TITLE: Phoenixville Region Multi-Modal Transportation Plan

properties.PROJ_DESC: A Master Plan will be produced that provides a framework for circulation and land use along the Paoli Pike corridor. It will focus on developing a Paoli Pike Promenade that is multi-modal, focusing on pedestrian safety.
properties.TITLE: Paoli Pike Corridor Master Plan

properties.PROJ_DESC: A coordinated transportation and land use study will identify alternative modes along Route 30 to address the problems of traffic congestion and its negative impacts on surrounding residential neighborhoods.
properties.TITLE: Route 30 Corridor Study

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will analyze the existing parking demands and infrastructure in the downtown business corridor. The study will examine existing conditions, the needs of local business owners, downtown residents, and visitors
properties.PROJ_DESC2: as well as project future parking needs for additional residential development.
properties.TITLE: Downtown Parking Study

properties.PROJECTNAM: Pottstown Pike Congestion Mitigation Feasibility Study
properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will address access issues to the Exton Train Station as well as examine the potential for transit-oriented development.
properties.TITLE: Pottstown Pike Congestion Mitigation Feasibility Study

properties.PROJ_DESC: To address the loss of residential and commercial tenancy over the past decade, the County Planning Department will undertake a visioning process to help stimulate reinvestment in Delaware County’s Central Places.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: The process will result in three separate vision plans.
properties.TITLE: Downtown Awakening: Central Places Visioning

properties.PROJ_DESC: In response to trolley investments in the downtown, an updated economic development strategy will be developed that focuses on continued residential and commercial business growth in the central business district.
properties.TITLE: Updated Economic Development Strategy

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will address high volumes of traffic through the central business district and residential neighborhoods. It will analyze possible transportation solutions such as traffic calming and streetscape enhancements
properties.TITLE: Morton Connect

properties.PROJECTNAM: Multi-Modal Modernization of the Garrett Road Corridor
properties.PROJ_DESC: This project will include a traffic study to identify vehicular and pedestrian circulation through the Garrett Road and Byword Avenue area. It will identify potential placemaking enhancements to modernize
properties.PROJ_DESC2: and increase accessibility of the SEPTA 101 and 102 lines.
properties.TITLE: Multi-Modal Modernization of the Garrett Road Corridor

properties.PROJ_DESC: This project is part of an ongoing effort to enhance bike and pedestrian mobility through the county. This plan will include design improvements and key policies for bicycle safety.
properties.TITLE: Bike Montco Plan Development

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study strives to maximize the capacity of the Township’s transportation infrastructure by increasing transit ridership and encouraging increased pedestrian and bicycle mobility throughout, specifically to the train station.
properties.TITLE: Walk Park Train

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will identify a preferred alignment for a multi-use recreation trail from the Madison Lot (SEPTA station) to the Lansdale/Hatfield municipal border.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: The trail will enhance walkability in Lansdale and connect directly to the downtown business corridor.
properties.TITLE: Liberty Bell Trail Alignment Study

properties.PROJ_DESC: A connectivity plan will be developed that analyzes the existing transportation network and provides recommendations for accommodating future residential development.
properties.TITLE: Ridge Pike West Corridor Study

properties.PROJECTNAM: Transportation Demand Plan (TDM) Plan for the Ft. Washington Office Park
properties.PROJ_DESC: The TDM plan will address current commuting patterns of the park’s current employees, barriers to alternative modes of transportation, and future residential and commercial growth
properties.TITLE: Transportation Demand Plan (TDM) Plan for the Ft. Washington Office Park

properties.PROJECTNAM: Where the Sidewalk Gaps: A Program for Prioritizing Repairs
properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will analyze peer city sidewalk repair strategies and provide recommendations for Philadelphia-specific repair program and prioritization methodology.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: The menu of implementation options will enable the City government to evaluate solutions to equitably maintain sidewalks.
properties.TITLE: Where the Sidewalk Gaps: A Program for Prioritizing Repairs

properties.PROJ_DESC: The City of Philadelphia released its Complete Streets Handbook which articulated the City’s multi-modal standards and priorities.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: The proposed calculator will provide a tool to predict the impact of future development on transportation priorities and analyze the social and financial impact complete streets provides.
properties.TITLE: Complete Streets Calculator

properties.PROJECTNAM: Critical Matchmaking between Vision Zero Research and Practice
properties.PROJ_DESC: TCDI funding will enable the City of Philadelphia to engage its research community to develop innovative, smart thinking around Vision Zero and other related policies.
properties.PROJ_DESC2: Outreach will be conducted to neighboring cities on best practices and a report will be produced with recommended policies for Philadelphia.
properties.TITLE: Critical Matchmaking between Vision Zero Research and Practice

properties.PROJ_DESC: This study will further the recommendations from the Lower Northwest District Plan Focus Area and examine immediate and long-term improvements to accommodate new development and increase transportation access and safety.
properties.TITLE: Wissahickon Gateway
